duties_responsibilities.duty: Create iDAS and Small Cell network designs to include system equipment selection
Produce and document RF predictions and link budgets for design approvals
Assist in ensuring detailed scopes of work, processes, procedures, and test plans for construction teams
Update system databases including Small Cell Geographic Information System (SCGIS) and Asset Management System (AMS)
Participate in field testing activities such as evaluating existing RF environment and Continuous Wave propagation analysis
Assist with RF and fiber testing, reporting, and troubleshooting
Review and approve various construction contractor provided field test results
Develop a firm understanding of link budgets, noise figures, and intermodulation products
Have a basic knowledge of radio wave propagation fundamentals, antenna theory, and optical transmission medium

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering preferred, relevant military and/or industry experience may be considered
